You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &int;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Int;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/222c/index.htm U+0222C].
  * `&int;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/222b/index.htm U+0222B].
